Name: LELY
Review Text: One of the best restaurant in Amsterdam west. The food is great, high quality standard. I can definitely recommend it.

Name: LELY
Review Text: A great place to meet up with friends for drinks and snacks, just next to Lelylaan station. Great menu with lots of beers, cocktails, and tasty bites! They have a spacious covered terrace as well as extra seating for warmer, sunnier days.

Name: LELY
Review Text: Super friendly staff, not very elaborate but very tasteful menu. The dishes are original, somewhat fancy variations on popular foods. Portions not too big, but just right for most (big eaters will want both a starter and a side dish). Friendly, homey atmosphere

Name: LELY
Review Text:
The burgers arrived fast and very extremely tasty! The fries was also of good quality.
Friendly, smiling staff!
Nice interior, big selection of beers.

Name: LELY
Review Text: Perfect place for drinks and dinner in the vicinity. Our regular for most of the Friday drinks. Thanks Frits and his team for all the effort! The finger food is always good, but tried the dinner options this time. Were not disappointed!

Name: LELY
Review Text: Had lunch here with 7 people after my wedding. Nice and casual place. The staff / kitchen struggled a bit to give all orders at once, but service was good anyway. Breakfast menu: great, food: okay/good, staff: friendly and relaxed.

Name: LELY
Review Text: Nice bar. Friendly staff. But the menu for main dishes should include a bit more dishes.

Name: LELY
Review Text:
Cozy Caf√© with pro stuff and perfect coffee.

I love this place.

Name: LELY
Review Text: Nice location, lots of green (plants) inside making this big venture a nice place to stay. Huge terrace outside for these summer day's. Interiour is suitable for  big plave like this making it comfy. Staff is good, nice there when and where you need them, good service.

Name: LELY
Review Text: I have been to bar lely three times for coffee, cakes, and beers. I love their spacious and chic interior, the food and drinks are all really nice, and the staff are all very kind. Prices are average but quality is a bit better than other cafes in my view!

Name: LELY
Review Text: The place is excellent but needs to get some better. For example, the menu must have been more clear, free wi-fi to the customers and more dedication and attention to the customers. However, the food is excellent and the place as well. Nice to chill with friends or some partner

Name: LELY
Review Text: Can not recommend this place enough, it‚Äôs always my first stop before the airport and my last stop before I leave Amsterdam again. They have a heated outside area, amazingly friendly staff and a diverse menu of food and drinks.

Name: LELY
Review Text: Great experience..food was great. We were sitting there for more then 4 hours.stuff were nice and polite and very kind.they never asked us to leave even if we didn't order all over this 4 hours.recomended!

Name: LELY
Review Text:
Nice place to grab something to drink or have a lekker dinner. Their stuff is friendly.
I like their big terrace, it's warm and sunny when the weather is nice.

Name: LELY
Review Text: Had a great dinner with 6. Friendly staff, good food and nice atmosphere. Definitely recommend!

Name: LELY
Review Text: Very nice staff, great food and a good place to hang out. On Wednesdays they serve a great fish. Unfortunately not the best view because of the train station, but probably the best restaurant around.

Name: LELY
Review Text: I'm here right now as I write this, so far we've had some drinks and lunch, the atmosphere is killer. This is one place I wish I'd discovered earlier. The waiters are awesome, everyone is smiling.

Name: LELY
Review Text:
Wonderful place to eat.

Marvellous outside big terrace. ‚Ä¶

Name: LELY
Review Text: Good environment, the amount of food in dishes aren't that much but they are acceptable.

Name: LELY
Review Text: Food absolutely delicious and beautiful!! The staff are super polite and kind. Made my day!

Name: LELY
Review Text: Stopped by just to get WiFi. Ordered a espresso and a carrot cake just because... ‚Ä¶

Name: LELY
Review Text: Food was nice! Location looks cute too. But service wasn‚Äôt great. Had to ask 5 times for a sharing plates (which we asked for when ordering) and new cutlery, while food was already in front of us.

Name: LELY
Review Text: Nice bar with great ambience. Okay kitchen with bites and hamburgers. Huge terrace. Gem in West.

Name: LELY
Review Text: Nice place to chill, it beats anything else from the NS. They have a nice menu and great coffee with very friendly personnel üëåüòÄ

Name: LELY
Review Text:

Name: LELY
Review Text: Great design.. the space is multifunctional.. coffee bar/publ/club/lunch spot. Well located.

Name: LELY
Review Text: Good coffee, great beers and drink selection good food, awesome nachos with pulled pork!

Name: LELY
Review Text: Great food and drinks. Very nice terrace and super enthusiastic crew providing amazing service.

Name: LELY
Review Text: Cheerful staf. Nice coffee & burgers. Cozy and best (or only?) spot in area Lelylaan.

Name: LELY
Review Text: A very nice place for breakfast. The bread will make you come back

Name: LELY
Review Text: Great vegan burger, some might even say better than a cheese burger, good drinks and friendly staff.

Name: LELY
Review Text: Great brunch at Lely üëç

Name: LELY
Review Text: I love the atmosphere and the staff have always been wonderful. The place has contributed to the most incredible conversations I've ever had the chance of having. Their selection of beer is typically excellent. Pick something more extravagant when ordering drinks, you won't be disappointed.

Name: LELY
Review Text: Really nice place! Big outside area where you can sit and have a beer and snacks. The food was really good and fresh. I had a rib-eye steak which was really nice. You can taste and know that everything is cooked on demand and no re-heating ‚Ä¶

Name: LELY
Review Text: Great service, delicious carrot cake, really good coffee and lovely atmosphere. Will be a regular!

Name: LELY
Review Text: Finally a bar with a modern look & feel with cocktails close to Lelylaan station! Cheap, good cocktails, gets pretty busy in the evenings.

Name: LELY
Review Text: Nice place, good food. Our waitress had the nicest smile ‚Ä¶

Name: LELY
Review Text: Completely surpassed all expectations! The menu is small and doesn't look like much. We ordered a cheeseburger with fries. It was absolutely amazing! The patty was large, fresh, and tasty, the brioche bun nice and soft, the fries also amazing (just the right amount, too) and the sauce amazing. Loved every bite!

Name: LELY
Review Text: It tasted really bad. What a wasted of my time and money. Kimchi cheese sandwich is the worst combination. The take out package is not environmentally friendly.

Name: LELY
Review Text: Great food! This place is a great place to go if you just came from some place far using the train just in time for a meal. I really liked my burger and fries. Waiters were very nice. It's also very easy to find because it's in a very open area by the train station.

Review Text: The beautiful thing about the Netherlands is that not all great venues are within the centre of the cities. LELY is located conveniently near the IND and Lelylaan station. The staff are very warm and relaxed, the coffee is great, with ample beers on tap. An outer city diamond worth travelling to.

Name: LELY
Review Text: One of them hip and layd back restaurants. Really nicely decorated, the staff super friendly. The veggie burger I ordered was stupid good. Oh and they have cold beer from the tap.

Name: LELY
Review Text: Recently opened in the Little Manhattan complex, this bar restaurant is a fantastic choice to drink and eat, specially in cases of big groups gathering. It has a very large terrace facing west, so plenty of sunshine for after work borrel.

Name: LELY
